feedback.heading: Give us your feedback
feedback.firstQuestion: Were we able to answer your question?
feedback.secondQuestion: Did you find the relevant information you were looking for?
feedback.thirdQuestion: Was the FAQ Webpage user friendly?
feedback.fourthQuestion: Is there anything you would want us to improve?
feedback.fifthQuestion: How would you rate our service?
